item.title: Morgan Stanley’s top picks into earnings include AMD and Costco
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices and Costco will report earnings next Tuesday and Wednesday, respectively.

item.title: Silver is having a parabolic move. How to hedge against a decline using options
item.description: Michael Khouw breaks down how to hedge risk in silver using options.

item.title: Dutch Bros’ brand strength sets stage for growth in the coffee chain, says Citi
item.description: Citi's $82 price target implies that shares of Dutch Bros could rally 34% from here.

item.title: Mike Santoli: Can an old bull learn new tricks?
item.description: Now in its fourth year, the bull market is maturing and finding it harder to rely on the energy sources of its youth.

item.title: Meta poised for nearly 40% upside on compelling AI and ad opportunities, analyst says
item.description: After stalling over the past 12 months, Rothschild & Co Redburn believes that shares of Meta could rally 37% from here.
